description: Duke Hennessy is the head of the Battle Chateau house and he greeted Ash Ketchum when he arrived. He runs the Battle Chateau as a social meeting place where he offers first-rate fights to any ladies and gentlemen that train Pok√©mon. Furthermore, all Trainers are referred to as "knights" and as people advance through an order of sequential titles called "peerage ranks" are awarded according to their battle results.
name: Ikkon
